Topic.Title: Can’t make my quest games unlisted

Posts.EditableText: I made a game with the quest format but I can’t list it on the site. Why?
Posts.HTML: I made a game with the quest format but I can’t list it on the site. Why?

Posts.EditableText:
All new games are checked by a moderator first.
After about a week, it will become listed.
Posts.HTML:
All new games are checked by a moderator first.
After about a week, it will become listed.

Posts.EditableText: There are no games to check neither under your user profile or nor in the uncategorized game section.  Try to re-publish your game if you would and/or provide a link.
Posts.HTML: There are no games to check neither under your user profile or nor in the uncategorized game section. Try to re-publish your game if you would and/or provide a link.
